name: Stasis Enchant
active: Stasis: Become untargetable and invulnerable for 2.5 seconds, but unable to move, attack, cast abilities, or use items (120 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Armor. Active effect: Become untargetable and invulnerable for 2.5 seconds, but unable to move, attack, cast abilities, or use items (120 second cooldown).. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
tips: Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy physical damage compositions
The resistances help you survive longer in team fights
